trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture" /> event.
The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
The results from the gesture recognizer.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs" /> class.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether strokes should be considered a gesture.
trans-unit.target: 스트로크를 제스처로 간주할지 여부를 나타내는 부울 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the strokes are ink; <see langword="false" /> if the strokes are a gesture.
trans-unit.target: 스트로크가 잉크이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 스트로크가 제스처이면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event occurs, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property depends on the first <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> in the collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> 이벤트 발생의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> 속성에 따라 달라 집니다 첫 번째 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> 에서 반환 된 컬렉션에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture>, or if it is a gesture whose <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> is a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Strong>, then <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture>, 제스처 경우 또는 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> 아닌 다른 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Strong>, 다음 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> 은 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `false`.

When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> adds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A> to its <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> is `true`, the strokes are not added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> 은 `true`, 스트로크에 추가 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns results from the gesture recognizer.
A collection of possible application gestures that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes" /> might be.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes" />의 가능한 응용 프로그램 제스처가 들어 있는 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 컬렉션의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> 별로 정렬 된 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성.

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> might return a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> objects with the following values:
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> 의 컬렉션을 반환할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> 다음 값을 사용 하 여 개체:

trans-unit.source: Index
ApplicationGesture
RecognitionConfidence

This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: 즉는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> 가능성이 매우 인식 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> 비교적 가능성이 확인 표시 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> 하지 제스처 및 일 가능성이 전혀 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> 소용돌이 또는 이중 소용돌이 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> with a higher degree of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than it has for other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A> 메서드 배열을 반환할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> 와 더 높은 수준의 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> 다른 응용 프로그램 제스처이 보다 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 가능성이 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> 이 작은 하는 제스처 대신 제스처 않습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The generic handler / delegate implementation to be invoked.
The target on which the provided handler should be invoked.
When overridden in a derived class, provides a way to invoke event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase efficiency over the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의된 경우 기본 구현 이상으로 효율성을 높일 수 있는 형식별 방법으로 이벤트 처리기를 호출하는 방법을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that represent the possible gesture.
The strokes that represent the possible gesture.
